content: Take my hand. I'll pull you up.

content: I'm only looking mah! I wasn't gonna do anythin' to it, but that crab was so mean! Why'd it go and smack me?
info: 云果小故事-海边螃蟹_云果故事线

content: I'm mad, really, really mad~! {A叹气}I-I'll get my revenge, yes, revenge... <style=SizeSmall>Think I said the same thing half an hour ago...</style>

content: I have never seen the ocean before mah, only heard from Gran'mama that shrimp, crabs, and shellfish make real good fertilizers. So, I came to take a look.
info: 云果小故事-海边螃蟹_云果故事线

content: {A惊叹}Really mah?! Yeeek! It's comin' this way! That one! The crab that keeps scuttlin' sideways on purpose!
info: 云果小故事-海边螃蟹_云果故事线

content: {A疑惑}Yeee~? Watch you do what? Look out! It's comin'! The crab that keeps scuttlin' sideways on purpose!
info: 云果小故事-海边螃蟹_云果故事线

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, you're good at beachcombin', right? Are you free right now? Well mah, um, I just wanna... <style=SizeSmall>a-ask if... Agh, so embarrassin'...</style>

content: You want me to get revenge for you?

content: Thanks~! Well mah...{短暂停} You know what?

content: {A观察前方}I-I got punched by a crab!

content: Yunguo hesitantly takes my hand and rises with my help.
